text: John McBain may refer to: * John McBain (American judge) - judge of the 4th Circuit Court in Jackson County, Michigan since 2002 * John McBain (musician) (born 1965), American musician * John McBain (One Life to Live), character on the American soap operas One Life to Live and General Hospital * Jock McBain (1882-1941), Scottish trade unionist and political activist ==See also== *John Bain (disambiguation)
title: John McBain
